CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 21, 1963, pg. 3 reads: "Saddened - Mrs. Clara Jones (center), mother of Lloyd E. Brown of Mahon St., who was killed in the auto accident, is shown, with the surviving brothers and sisters of Mr. Brown, and his fiancee, Claudette Benson (right) of 2025 Centre Ave., who was looking forward to marrying Brown next week. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of surviving family members of car accident victim Lloyd E. Brown, including Clara Jones, mother, seated center, surrounded by her three sons and five daughters, and Claudette Benson, right, fiancee, posed around dark print sofa in living room interior with mirror, doorway, and fireplace with mantle, 2025 Centre Avenue, another version
